Body:
rng = np.random.RandomState(0)
n = 100
a = ot.unif(n)
b = ot.unif(n)
x = rng.randn(n, 2)
M = ot.dist(x, x)
G_sink = ot.sinkhorn(a, b, M, 0.001)
G_screen = ot.bregman.screenkhorn(a, b, M, 0.001, uniform=True, verbose=True)
np.testing.assert_allclose(G_sink.sum(0), G_screen.sum(0), atol=0.01)
np.testing.assert_allclose(G_sink.sum(1), G_screen.sum(1), atol=0.01)
